summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4824 for the improvement of Ravenna Avenue, from East 62nd Street on the west to East 63rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55894, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
